interestingcomments.content: Canon R top LCD display: can hardly see it even in full light! /!/ Am I missing something here?  I can barely see the top lcd display in complete light ....when I get to sub optimal lighting conditions, it becomes completely too dark to see.   Is there a light for this?  I see a light icon but it doesn't seem to do anything when I press it.
